name: GIFT CARD $50/75/100 or more
description:
Send some one a gift card to our store! We know its hard to choose what someone might love! It's also perfect when you're late sending a gift!

You'll get a digital card with a code the recipient can use towards any product in our store.  

Shipping (for all places) and domestic taxes for USA are included in this price. Overseas taxes/customs duties will be the responsibility of the recipient.

You can specify any amount. Just mail us, we're happy to put up a new listing for you!

name: SQUARE SILK SCARF 2 reversible gray red fuchsia pink
description:
Fuchsia Rose and Crimson apposed with a Slate Gray back, all together in a distinctive, soft and lightweight reversible silk scarf. A Silver Gray satin tape weaves in to create a beautiful pattern around the scarf.

This meticulously crafted article is unique. There is no other just the same.

FABRIC: Fine textured pure silk with a super soft finish.

SIZE: 36 x 36 inches (91.4 x 91.4 cm).

CARE: We recommend dry cleaning for all silks. Iron on low heat setting if required.

SHIPPING: Free for the US, and discounted for all other places. All articles are shipped via USPS within two working days.

RETURN POLICY: You can return unworn articles for a full refund or exchange them for something else. Please see our shop policies for complete details.

* * *

All of the scarves and stockings you see in our store are tied, pleated, folded, knotted, stitched, rolled, or twisted again and again between many dips in the dyeing vats. Every time we get something new and magical which is why we label our work as "art you wear". Some pieces are also printed with custom designs, and embellished with surface ornamentation techniques like embroidery.

name: PATTERNED STOCKING red black
description:
Cardinal, Earth Red, Crushed Berry, Chalk, Damson and Deep Red Brown come together to form a striking texture made using the Nui shibori technique of resist dyeing.

18 hours of meticulous hand crafting resulted in this beautiful one of a kind work of art. As with all Origei creations, it is unique. There is no other just the same.

Style: Thigh high Stocking - Medium thick (40 Denier)

Size: Free size
Height: 4' 11" - 5' 9" (150 - 175 cm)

Care: Hand wash in cold water with mild soap, and dry flat.

* * *

We try to represent and describe our colors accurately and only photograph in natural light. However colors do vary from monitor to monitor.

Each meticulously crafted article is unique and comes in a pristine state to you in a beautiful package with an original (copyrighted) illustration by me. Great for gifting!
